description: Proxmox Dashboard on nuc11  complete, using Flux + Loki

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "cpustat" and
    r._field == "cpu"
  )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${server}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: -1m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cpustat" and r._field == "cpus")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${server}")
  |> limit(n:1)

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: -1m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "memory" and r._field == "memtotal")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${server}")
  |> limit(n:1)

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: -1m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "memory" and
    r._field == "swaptotal"
  )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${server}")
  |> limit(n:1)

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: -1m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "memory")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "swapfree")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${server}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: -1m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cpustat" and r._field == "cpus")
  |> limit(n:1)

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: -1m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "avail" or r._field == "used")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["nodename"] == "${server}")
  |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _time: r._time, _measurement: r.measurement, _field: "used_perc", _value: float(v: 100) / (float(v: r.avail) + float(v: r.used)) * float(v:r.used)}))
  |> drop(columns: ["avail","used"])

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cpustat" and r._field == "avg1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${server}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

panels.description: Memory in use by Host OS, VM's and Containers

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: -1m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "memory" and r._field == "memused")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${server}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> last()

panels.title: Memory in Use

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cpustat" and r._field == "wait")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${server}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn:mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: -1m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "memory" and r._field == "memtotal")
  |> limit(n:1)

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "cpustat" and
    r._field == "avg1"
  )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${server}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "memory")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "memused")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${server}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: -10m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "uptime")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["object"] != "nodes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value > 0)
  |> last()
  |> limit(n:1)
  |> group(columns: ["_measurement"])
  |> keep(columns: ["host","_value","nodename"])

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: -10m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "uptime")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["object"] == "qemu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["nodename"] == "${server}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value > 0)
  |> last()
  |> limit(n:1)
  |> group(columns: ["_measurement"])
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","host","_value"])

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["object"] == "qemu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] > 0)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["nodename"] == "${server}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

mem = from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["object"] == "qemu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] > 0)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["nodename"] == "${server}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

maxmem = from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "maxmem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["object"] == "qemu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] > 0)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["nodename"] == "${server}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

join(
    tables: {mem:mem, maxmem:maxmem},
    on: ["_time","_stop","_start","host"]

)

|> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      _value: float(v:r._value_mem) / float(v:r._value_maxmem) * float(v:100),
      host: r.host
    })
  )

|> group(columns: ["host"])

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "diskread")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["object"] == "qemu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] > 0)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["nodename"] == "${server}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s)
//  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "diskwrite")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["object"] == "qemu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] > 0)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["nodename"] == "${server}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s)
//  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "netin")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["object"] == "qemu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] > 0)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["nodename"] == "${server}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
//  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "netout")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["object"] == "qemu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] > 0)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["nodename"] == "${server}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
//  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: -10m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "uptime")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["object"] == "lxc")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["nodename"] == "${server}")
  |> last()
  |> limit(n:1)
  |> group(columns: ["_measurement"])
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","host","_value"])

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["object"] == "lxc")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["nodename"] == "${server}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
//  |> yield(name: "mean")

mem = from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["object"] == "lxc")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["nodename"] == "${server}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

maxmem = from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "maxmem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["object"] == "lxc")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] > 0)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

join(
    tables: {mem:mem, maxmem:maxmem},
    on: ["_time","_stop","_start","host"]

)

|> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      _value: float(v:r._value_mem) / float(v:r._value_maxmem) * float(v:100),
      host: r.host
    })
  )

|> group(columns: ["host"])

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "diskread")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["object"] == "lxc")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["nodename"] == "${server}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s)
//  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "diskwrite")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["object"] == "lxc")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["nodename"] == "${server}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s)

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "netin")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["object"] == "lxc")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["nodename"] == "${server}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
//  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "netout")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["object"] == "lxc")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["nodename"] == "${server}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

list.definition:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    r._measurement == "system" and
    r.object == "nodes"
  )
  |> keyValues(keyColumns: ["host"])
  |> group()
  |> keep(columns: ["host"])
  |> distinct(column: "host")
list.label: Server
list.name: server
list.query:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    r._measurement == "system" and
    r.object == "nodes"
  )
  |> keyValues(keyColumns: ["host"])
  |> group()
  |> keep(columns: ["host"])
  |> distinct(column: "host")

title: Service: Proxmox (nuc11)
